DefaultReaderConfiguration.fullDescription: Collects events from Network Box firewall devices.

file.toolTipText: Directory or path to read from

string.toolTipText: Hostname of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

integer.toolTipText: Port number of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

select.toolTipText: Data routing (normalized alerts to Manager and/or raw data to nDepth)

integer.toolTipText: Number of seconds between log reads

FastPattern.matcher: ^(\d+) (\S+) : ([-A-Z]+) boxid=(\S+) cachems=\d+ cachesize=\d+ category=(.+) content=(\S+) hier=\w+ hierhost=[-/\w.]+ hitrule=[-\w]+ host=[-\w.]+ httpcode=(\d+) logrule=\w+ method=([A-Z]+) occured="[^"]+" result=\d+ sourceip=([\d.]+) tags=\w+ url=(.+)

FastFormatter.format: ICMP CODE Destination is Administratively Prohibited
ICMP CODE Destination is Administratively Prohibited
ICMP CODE Destination Unreachable for Service
ICMP CODE Destination Host Unreachable for Service
ICMP CODE Precedence Cutoff in Effect
ICMP CODE Redirect for the Host
ICMP CODE Redirect for Service and Network
ICMP CODE Redirect for Service and Host
ICMP CODE Alternate Address for Host
ICMP CODE Time to Live exceeded in Transit
ICMP CODE Fragment Reassembly Time Exceeded
ICMP CODE Pointer indicates the error
ICMP CODE Missing a Required Option
ICMP CODE Destination is Administratively Prohibited
ICMP CODE Destination is Administratively Prohibited
ICMP CODE Destination Unreachable for Service
ICMP CODE Destination Host Unreachable for Service
ICMP CODE Precedence Cutoff in Effect
ICMP CODE Redirect for the Host
ICMP CODE Redirect for Service and Network
ICMP CODE Redirect for Service and Host
ICMP CODE Alternate Address for Host
ICMP CODE Time to Live exceeded in Transit
ICMP CODE Fragment Reassembly Time Exceeded
ICMP CODE Pointer indicates the error
ICMP CODE Missing a Required Option

FastPattern.matcher: ^(\d+) ([-\w.]+) : ([-A-Z]+) boxid=(\S+) direction=\w+ fileid=([-\w.]+) from=(.*) module=\w+ occured="[^"]+" quarantine=([-\w.]+) remoteip=([\d.]+) size=\d+ source=(\w+) subject=.* threat=([-\w.']+) to=(.*)
^(\d+) ([-\w.]+) : ([-A-Z]+) boxid=(\S+) direction=\w+ fileid=([-\w.]+) from=(.*) occured="[^"]+" quarantine=(\w*) remoteip=([\d.]*) size=\d+ source=(\w+) subject=.* threat=(\S+) to=(.+)

^(\d+) ([-\w.]+) : ([-A-Z]+) alertupdates=(\d+) boxid=(\S+) comment="([^"]+)" completed="[^"]+" configurationupdates=(\d+) dbversion="([^"]+)" occured="[^"]+" patchupdates=(\d+) pid=\d+ signatureupdates=(\d+) softwareupdates=(\d+) source=([\d.]+) sourcenoc="([^"]+)"

FastField.defaultValue: BoxID: $5, AlertUpdates: $4, ConfigurationUpdates: $7, PatchUpdates: $9, SignatureUpdates: $10, SoftwareUpdates: $11

FastPattern.matcher: ^(\d+) ([-\w.]+) : ([-A-Z]+) boxid=(\S+) comment="([^"]+)" (?:completed="[^"]+" )?occured="[^"]+" pid=\d+ port=([/\w]+) source=([\d.]+) sourcenoc=(.*)
^(\d+) ([-\w.]+) : ([-A-Z_]+) authenticate=([-\w.]*) boxid=(\S+) comment=(.*) completed="[^"]+" pid=\d+ source=([\d.]*) user=(\S+).*
(\d+) ([-\w.]+) : ([-A-Z_]+) authenticate=\S+ boxid=(\S+) client=(\S+) comment=(\S+) (?:completed="[^"]+" )?occured="[^"]+" pid=\d+ port=(\S+) server=(\S+) subtype=(\S+) type=(\S+)
^(\d+) ([-\w.]+) ([-\w]+)\[(\d+)\]: Command: INST reception of file ([-/\w.]+) starting\s*
FastPattern.pattern: ^\d+ [-\w.]+ nbsbox\[\d+\]: Command: INST reception of file [-/\w.]+ starting
^\d+ [-\w.]+ nbsbox\[\d+\]: Command: PASS <parameters present but hidden>
^\d+ [-\w.]+ nbsbox\[\d+\]: Connection authenticated with [-\w]+, to level \d+

FastPattern.matcher: ^(\d+) ([-\w.]+) ([-\w]+)\[(\d+)\]: cleanup of ([-/\w.]+) (removed \d+ signatures and \(\d+/\d+\) in use)\s*
FastPattern.pattern: ^\d+ [-\w.]+ kaspersky-cleanup\[\d+\]: cleanup of [-/\w.]+ removed \d+ signatures and \(\d+/\d+\) in use

FastPattern.matcher: ^(\d+) ([-\w.]+) ([-\w]+)\[(\d+)\]: Command: INST install archive requires authentication level (\d+)\s*
FastPattern.pattern: ^\d+ [-\w.]+ nbsbox\[\d+\]: Command: INST install archive requires authentication level \d+
^\d+ [-\w.]+ nbsbox\[\d+\]: Command: INST run update watcher [-/\w.]+ .+ </dev/null >/dev/null 2>/dev/null
^\d+ [-\w.]+ kaspersky-cleanup\[\d+\]: successfully loaded new signatures into [-\w]+\[\d+\]
^\d+ [-\w.]+ nbsbox\[\d+\]: Install file passes authentication tests
^\d+ [-\w.]+ nbsbox\[\d+\]: Command: INST install file\([-/\w.]+ *\) is auth\(\d+\)

FastPattern.matcher: ^(\d+) (\S+) \d+ [-\w:.]+ (\S+) (\w+) (\d+) webclient - (\w+) application=(\S+) .*? local_n=([-\w.]+) .*?local_protocol=(\S+) .*?remote_n=([-\w.]+) .*?remote_protocol=(\S+) .*?req_method=(\w+).*? req_useragent="([^"]+)".*?res_category=(\S+).*?result=(\S+).*?summary="([^"]+)" (?:urlhost=(\S+) urlpath=(.+) urlprefix=(\S+) urlquery=(\S*))?.*

^(\d+) (\S+) \d+ [-\w:.]+ (\S+) (\w+) (\d+) firewall - (\w+) firewall\.application=(\S+) firewall\.bridge\.out=(\S+) firewall\.hardware\.protocol=(\d+) firewall\.interface\.out=(\S+) firewall\.raw\.tag=(\S+) firewall\.result=(\w+) firewall\.tag=(\S+).*
^(\d+) (\S+) \d+ [-\w:.]+ (\S+) (\w+) (\d+) syslog.message - ([\w.]+) syslog.facility=(\S+) syslog.message=(.+) syslog.severity=(\S+) syslog.source=(\S+) syslog.tag=(\S+).*
^(\d+) (\S+) \d+ [-\w:.]+ (\S+) (\w+) (\d+) syslog.message - ([\w.]+) syslog.facility=(\S+) syslog.message="(.*)" syslog.severity=(\S+) syslog.source=(\S+) syslog.tag=(\S+).*

^(\d+) (\S+) \d+ [-\w:.]+ (\S+) (\w+) (\d+) firewall - (\w+) .*?firewall.ip.dst=([-\w.]+) firewall.ip.dstport=(\d+) (.*?) firewall.ip.protocol=(\w+) firewall.ip.protonum=(\d+) firewall.ip.src=([-\w.]+) firewall.ip.srcport=(\d+) .*?firewall.result=(\S+) .*?firewall.tag="([^"]+)".*

FastPattern.pattern: ^\d+ [-\w.]+ \d+ [-\w:.]+ \S+ nbsyslog \d+ smtpserver - smtpserver.+?delivery_message="\d+ The specified recipient is not accepted
^\d+ [-\w.]+ \d+ [-\w:.]+ \S+ nbsyslog \d+ smtpserver.+?delivery_message="\d+ message discarded by policy

FastField.defaultValue: SSL VPN Info: Username/Password authentication succeeded for username "$13" from "$8"

FastPattern.pattern: ^\d+ [-\w.]+ \d+ [-\w:.]+ \S+ nbsyslog \d+ mail.postfix - mail.postfix local_ip=[\d.]+ msg_type=[\w ]+ pid=\d+ queueid=\S+
^\d+ [-\w.]+ \d+ [-\w:.]+ \S+ nbsyslog \d+ mail.postfix - mail.postfix messageid=\S+ msg_type=[\w ]+ queueid=\S+
^\d+ [-\w.]+ \d+ [-\w:.]+ \S+ nbsyslog \d+ mail.postfix - mail.postfix delay=\S+ dsn=\S+ message="[^"]+" msg_type=.*info queueid=\S+ remote_ip=[\d.]+ remote_port=\d+ status=sent

FastPattern.matcher: ^(\d+) (\S+) \d+ [-\w:.]+ (\S+) (\w+) (\d+) (\S+) - ([\w.]+) (.+)res.timestamp="[^"]+" service=(\S+) severity=info source=(\S+) sourceip=([\d.]+) timestamp="[^"]+" user=(\S+)
